item.title: Flooding, 18th December
item.description:
The road and pavement has not been swept once in the last three months, The gullies are blocked by leaves, the road is flooded, I cannot get out of my house. Yet you claim everything is OK???

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lingwood Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 18th December
item.description:
At around 11.30-12 today I witnessed someone fly tipping on Worgan Street. I later walked past and saw the rubbish including a sofa and shelving.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Worgan Street, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken row of street lights, 18th December
item.description:
From outside the Surrey Quay shopping centre where bus stop J and K ( Deal porter way) are until the underpass, the entire row of street lights are not working. It is incredibly dark at night and make it feel very unsafe for a lone woman to walk, in addition to cyclists going on the same path, risk of accidents, risk of crimes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deal Porters Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
